website_summaries.verdict: Zoo Med’s vitamin and mineral enriched hermit crab food was specifically formulated for land crabs, and is made of a blend of fish and shrimp meat that they can’t get enough of.
pros: Fish meal, soybean meal, wheat, shrimp meal, and corn gluten meal are the first 5 ingredients
cons: Your hermit crab may not be interested unless its pellets are moistened first

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hermit crabs will love this. There is a great amount in each bottle, and I have three crabs so having their meals last at the cost effective end of the budget is important! The best thing about this food though, is that it doesn't have the rank smell that can sometimes accompany snacks for the hermit crabs, and so it makes it easy, and painless to pour and to change when needed. I would buy this again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: ... in the pellet form and had a lot of waste. They do eat it well when I crush ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much luck getting the hermies to eat this food in the pellet form and had a lot of waste. They do eat it well when I crush it though. I mix a variety of foods in a zip lock bag, squeeze the air out, and use a rolling pin to crush the foods into a chunky powder. When I crush and mix a couple of foods together it goes a lot farther than the larger pellet form, and they continue to get a well balanced diet. I will treat them with fresh fruit and vegetables also.
customer_reviews.author: mbjst08041979

customer_reviews.title: We feed in small feed shell and it stays put and nice and clean while they crawl in and out to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality hermit crab food. Our hermies are more than 5 years old now and have grown out of their shells many times. This food is their staple diet along with fresh water and sea salted water. We feed in small feed shell and it stays put and nice and clean while they crawl in and out to dine. I was happy to find it on Amazon because it's not readily available in our local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Good food and it doesn't stink!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the food that our hermit crabs enjoy the most and I have tried many over the past two years. The main thing....THIS FOOD DOES NOT STINK. There have been a few foods that I have used for a day or two and then put the cap back on and stored in the cabinet for emergency use only due to the horrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.W.

customer_reviews.title: easy order
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing special about ordering this product from amazon, but it saved me a trip to the store and i was able to receive it in 2 days via my prime membership. that might sound as if i was too lazy to shop locally for the product and the reality is that in this case i was. i was able to get it delivered directly to me for the same price without the hassle of shopping locally for it. it is a product that i have used in the past, so there weren't any surprises and it was delivered fresh and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great food for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The price for this food is slightly cheaper is you receive free shipping from Amazon compared to what you pay in the pet store. Our hermit crabs seem to like it very much. It doesn't seem to have as many crumbled pieces as I have seen in some food that I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: kandiekane

customer_reviews.title: They must not like it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe just picky hermit crabs but I've been trying different kinds of foods and they avoid this unless its their only choice
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: My crabs do well with this food
customer_reviews.text: My crabs do well with this brand of food. Others have too much "junk" fillers in them. Will buy again. Have used a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delectable delight
customer_reviews.text: This delectable cuisine is just what your hermit crab is looking for. It’s like treating your pet to a high end 5 star classy meal, but no reservations needed!
customer_reviews.author: nancy c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of food my crabs will eat. I mix calcium powder, freeze dried shrimp, occasional fresh foods, and this every day for them and they love it. All living things food medley, HBH crab cookies and other foods have already gone down the drain and this one is perfect. Just the right amount of each ingredient and a taste crabs love. Would recommend!! :D
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Crab loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for many years, crab loves it
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Crab food
customer_reviews.text: Crab likes so I guess the flavor is good haha
customer_reviews.author: Bonita F Culver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My crab eats it well enough. We've fed him for a few year and he's still alive!
customer_reviews.author: Wildcatter98

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Crabs seem to like it, the only problem it gets bad very fast
customer_reviews.author: Jcjohnson

customer_reviews.title: My crab likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My crab is 6 years old, and he has survived eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: ... hermit crabs are very picky in food but they love this food
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs are very picky in food but they love this food.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great hermit crab food.
customer_reviews.text: Hermit crabs eat this well and it lasts a while. You should only add a little to the dish each feeding as the moist conditions of the tank may make it mold after a few days (you have to toss the food and wipe the dish out with a dry paper towel).
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crab Chow
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...it's hermit crab food. I use it to supplement the fresh veggies and fruits I give my hermies. They seem to like it and the price is great compared to the chain pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Korey

customer_reviews.title: Crabs like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming my crabs like it because they eat it.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY RAY

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Large, cylinder pieces. Hermies will not eat. Tried dry and wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstenin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs did not enjoy this food. It isfresh and priced reasonably but they would not eat it
customer_reviews.author: annnaumann

customer_reviews.title: Thanks as usual Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter a hermit crab a year ago and it finally ran out of food. Nowhere near me supplied hermit crab food and sure enough, Amazon came to my rescue yet again. It saved this poor starving crab's life which in turn saved my little girl many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crab Pellets
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is, came quick and was packaged good. Crabs don't really eat it much. I have tried it wet and dry. I am sure it's great but my babies are picky.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Money's Worth! :)
customer_reviews.text: This food came in a prompt manner, was one of the cheapest, came in perfect condition.....and my crabs LOVED it! Not only that, there is a LOT of food! I really like this product, and would not think twice about buying it again! Thank you Zoo Med, Darrah
customer_reviews.author: Darrah

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this type of food for my hermit crab for years and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bebeyounstru

customer_reviews.title: crabs like it, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Our crabs seem to like it just fine. Lasts a long time since they don't eat much. Most of it was still intact unlike other kinds that end up crushed up into powder at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Fed that Hermit Crab well
customer_reviews.text: Happy lil Hermit Crab. Seemed to gravitate to this particular food in his box rather than the other two pellet style foods available.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Shay

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance
customer_reviews.text: The hermit crabs are not really eating it. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: ordinary joe

customer_reviews.title: the crabs seem happy, so this food gets 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Well, the crabs seem happy, so this food gets 5 stars. Haven't tasted it personally, so I'll take their word for it.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: They would rather be hungry than eat this food
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are too big and my crabbies won't eat this food. I have to find a way to pulverize the pellets. Way too big for our small hermit crabs.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy.Benton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pellets make it easy and Hermie seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: eileen johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crab Like!!
customer_reviews.text: Wilbur the hermit crab loves it. Be sure to clean out as after a long weekend it may attract fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: Rio Bravo Fan

customer_reviews.title: my hermits like it but don't order it with anything big or ...
customer_reviews.text: my hermits like it but don't order it with anything big or you will end up with a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second was fine. Too much trouble to return
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 times. First bottle was busted and spilled in box. Second was fine. Too much trouble to return. Just out $5.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Hermie approved.
customer_reviews.text: Hermies LOVE this food! We have had our hermies for over 2 yrs. This is the first food they have really devoured.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy N.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My crabs liked the food, and it lasted for a long time. I didn't like how smelly it was.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Looby

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My crabs seem to not like this at all and wont eat it :(
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: wont eat.
customer_reviews.text: They won't eat it at all. So I got all dehydrated fruits an veggies an they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Haliey Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its super food for my sneaky little fellows like it very much... I Wish it came a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Hermie loves this
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crab Hermie will only Zoo Med Crab Food...have tried others but nope..this is yummy to him!!! Good product:+)
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this hermit crab food. The crabs love it and it was fresh and sealed package.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: My hermit crabs like this food the best
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. My hermit crabs like this food the best. They love the pellets but could care less about that other pet store shrimp food pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible. Also, the hermit crabs seem indifferent to it.
customer_reviews.author: James J Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Hermies say it's OK
customer_reviews.text: The hermies eat it but don't seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the great value. Much less expensive than purchasing it in a pet store. Crabs are doing great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and maybe even better. Received item fast and great packing. Would buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs won't eat this. Not even if it is the only thing in the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Meri Bea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement to "fresh" food. Everything is Fresh to a crab
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control??
customer_reviews.text: It was open when I received it in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good food. I don't really know if my hermit crabs like it though. Every time I go to play with them or just adjust something in their cage, I never see them eating! Well, I definitely know they are eating because some of it is gone. I have 6 hermit crabs and have only gone through about a fourth of the bottle in 3 months. Don't use that much of this food and mix it with fresh fruits and other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: KewlKid

customer_reviews.title: Good staple
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic food with most of what the crabbies need. I mix it with other foods too.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Remy

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't sealed when I received it, and as ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't sealed when I received it, and as far as I can tell, after 3 weeks, the crab still hasn't eaten any of it. Of course, it's hard to tell when he eats and he's not very active right now, so maybe that's the reason. It looks okay, and it isn't too smelly. Hoping he develops a taste for it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Not healthy for hermit crabs. After doing my research I realized this heritage crab food is of type that shouldn't be fed to hermit crabs. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daily

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ordered this and got freeze dried mealworms instead...way to go Petco
customer_reviews.author: Teri Micke

customer_reviews.title: Threw it out.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I will admit I did not actually use this product. I showed a vendor, that specializes in crabs, the ingredients. He said that this fish product will make the crabs smell. I trust him because he really cares about his crabs, gets great reviews, and has been around for years. I wanted to post this to let others know that this might happen. I did not want to take the risk.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: ... for my dogs to play with but the cats loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my dogs to play with but the cats loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: My hermit died.
customer_reviews.text: Might not have been the food but it was fine until about a week after i started feeding him this and he just stopped playing with the rocks and stuff... then.... ya no....
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin1999

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but..
customer_reviews.text: This is the food my hermit crabs seem to favor the most. Shipping on this item was very slow.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: Zoo Med Hermit Crab Food 2.4 oz
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This jar will last you a long time as hermit crabs do not eat very much. It is advisable to give them variety by putting a little fresh produce in from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: JStafford

product_meta.title: Zoo Med Hermit Crab Food
product_meta.description: Size:2.4A convenient pellet diet for all land hermit crabs. Use as regular staple food. Land herit crabs will thrive on Zoo Med's hermit crab diet. Made in USA.
feature_bullets: for all land type hermit crabs
Contains everything hermit crabs need to thrive
